title: Healthcare Practical Competency Enhancement: FANET Secure Routing Protocol Design and Optimization

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: The design principles of FL (Federated Learning) and blockchain-based FANET secure routing protocols can be explained
Network security enhancement strategies utilizing CF-mMIMO and STAR-RIS technologies can be proposed
Routing path optimization methods satisfying QoS requirements (latency, hop count) can be applied through cross-layer design

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
